item.title: Math
item.description: General: along with the basics(numbers and operations with numbers) go for: ch8 #1 ch9 #1,#2(adition of pair numbers and the geometric interpretation) Ch1: operations with numbers relations among numbers properties of the relations among numbers: addition multiplication inequalities positivity square roots n-th roots #1 => Integers: countable numbers: 1, 2, 3, .... , n natural numbers(positive integers): 0, 1, 2, 3, .
